title: From a Moment to a Movement
description:
Autumn Gupta and Bryanna Wallace have one of those friendships that feels more like a sisterhood. They work to make each other better — and when the Black Lives Matter movement took off, they teamed up to help make the world better, too. 

Learn more about Justice in June

Follow Bryanna and Autumn on Twitter

Follow Autumn and Bryanna on Instagram

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
